## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("bryceroney/actvotes")
```
## Datasets
This package currently contains the 2019 first preference results from the [ACT Electoral Commission](https://www.elections.act.gov.au)

### 2019 First Preference Data
```{r}
head(act_fp_2019)
```
